name: Little Quilty with loops
description:
A small quilt for a crib or to become a child’s favorite thing to carry around.

	Quilt top and bottom features all new cotton materials.  Lining is new cozy wool coating.

	Piecing and quilting are done on the very old machine I inherited from my grandmother.

	Gentle cycle machine wash or hand wash

	Size is 35 inches by 33 inches

name: Crayon Tote-Along
description:
This little jumbo crayon tote is perfect for entertainment for the little ones while out and about.  Crayons and a few little blank booklets are included.

	Dimensions:
5 inches by 12 inches

	The fabric portion of this item is all cotton.  The ribbon is vintage.
